TopicTitle: A staging mishap on the mun

Articles.Content:
Step one-land desired ship on mun

step two-activate engine and decouple the command modual/ probe below 5k

step three- return to kerbin land somewhere in the ksc biome- the light green beach.

HARD MODE- do it with minmus return to kerbin wth sepatrons on the modual 

Edited March 16, 2016 by Crafting origins
No offense, but this challenge is impossible and rushed. Did you read the guidelines?
He only has two posts so far, so likely not.

It's not impossible I have done so, it is extremely hard but it's a challenge

Can I see the mission?

I didn't record it.. Sorry

My technique was putting landing wheels to hold the capsule to the rocket and lots of reaction wheels for control I found it helpful to retract gear when you are at desired altitude around kerbin from your trans munar burn 

Have you tried it yet?
Ok maybe landing on the roof is too hard I got one on the runway so if that satisfies it enough
